title: Hi
body:
I post something here 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/fr/requests/30631812 
but nobody is respondind me not even the moderators or riots employers. Please can you help ?
It said that you must be 7 or higher to post a annoucement but im lvl 5 only. Can you please repost this for me ?

replies.body: Yea it can be a little bothersome, but some of the boards do require that you be a certain level. That link you gave me redirects to the sign in page, so I'm not sure where you were trying to post. You boards level is tied to your game Summoner level, so once you've hit level 7 there you'll be able to post where you need to!
